r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $36.0M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with WOOLLY MAMMOTH OUTERWEAR. The average
  contract duration was 2.15 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $49.6M.
  The longest contract was 2.81 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $49.8M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '36.0M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '100%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '183%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '2.5'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '39.4M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '2.15'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '49.6M'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '2.81'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '49.8M'
